keyword: how many calories are in four lokos
title: How Many Calories Are in Four Lokos?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in four lokos, including carbs, sugars, full nutrition breakdown per can, totals, and variations for this popular drink.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Four Lokos?
assumptions: Standard 23.5 fl oz (695 ml) can, fruit punch flavor, 12% ABV, no added mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, ABV, batch, and serving size. Alcoholic content affects calorie absorption; check labels and consume responsibly.

quick_answer.text: Four standard cans of Four Loko provide ~2,640 kcal, primarily from carbohydrates and alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to Four Loko Zero Sugar variant per can
Use 16 fl oz can size instead of 23.5 fl oz per loko
Mix with diet soda (dilutes calories by half per can)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Four Loko?
faqs.a: About 660 kcal per standard 23.5 fl oz can.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in four lokos?
faqs.a: Approximately 332 g total carbs, all from sugars.

faqs.q: Does Four Loko have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; calories come from carbs and alcohol.

faqs.q: How do flavors affect calories in Four Loko?
faqs.a: Most flavors are similar at ~660 kcal per can, but higher ABV variants may vary slightly.

faqs.q: Are there lower calorie Four Loko options?
faqs.a: Yes, Zero Sugar versions have ~100-200 kcal per can with reduced sugars.
